    • 方法详细资料

      • useChooser

        public Intents.Builder useChooser(boolean useChooser)

      • useChooser

        public Intents.Builder useChooser()

      • chooserTitle

        public Intents.Builder chooserTitle(java.lang.CharSequence chooserTitle)

      • requestCode

        public Intents.Builder requestCode(java.lang.Integer requestCode)

      • share

        public Intents.ShareBuilder share()
        Return builder for sharing request.
        Opens chooser dialog (if useChooser() method is called before) with all apps that can share provided text.
        Uses Intent.ACTION_SEND action and "plain/text" mime type.

      • openWebBrowser

        public boolean openWebBrowser(java.lang.String url)
        Opens given url in the default browser.

      • dial

        public boolean dial(java.lang.String phone)
        Opens standard dialer app with prefilled phone number.

      • openGooglePlay

        public boolean openGooglePlay(java.lang.String appPackage)
        Opens Google Play app details screen for specified package. Opens browser if Google Play app is not found.

      • openYouTube

        public boolean openYouTube(java.lang.String videoId)
        Opens YouTube app with given video id.

      • pickPhoneNumber

        public boolean pickPhoneNumber()
        Opens phone picker activity. See also IntentsHandler.onPickPhoneResult(android.content.Context, android.content.Intent)

      • pickPhotoFromGallery

        public boolean pickPhotoFromGallery()
        Opens gallery image picker activity. You can get picked image's Uri using Intent.getData() inside Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent) method.

      • sendSms

        public Intents.SmsBuilder sendSms()
        Returns builder for sms sending request.

      • sendEmail

        public Intents.EmailBuilder sendEmail()
        Returns builder for "add calendar event" request.

      • addToCalendar

        public Intents.AddToCalendarBuilder addToCalendar()
        Returns builder for "add calendar event" request.

      • open

        public boolean open(android.content.Intent intent)
